vocabInfos.mediumDef:
buttock - a variant of Seth, a man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.25;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Cain (H7014B) and Abel (H1893);
father of: Enosh (H0583); also called Sheth (Ketiv: buttock) at Num.24.17;
Another name of shet (שֵׁת "Seth" H8352)
§ 1) seat of body, buttocks Nu 24:17
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
一個民族名稱 #民 24:17|
(和合本沒有譯成專有名詞."毀壞擾亂之子"的原文是"挖所有謝特人的井")
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
一个民族名称 #民 24:17|
(和合本没有译成专有名词."毁坏扰乱之子"的原文是"挖所有谢特人的井")
